author: Daniel Kent
comment: Looks excellent on my Sony Smartwatch 3. The time is NOT hard to read despite what other critics are saying. The only thing it lacks is configuration to display a date also but I like the fact there are no in-app purchases and that it doesn't require any permissions. Exactly how it should be and it does exactly what it says it does. Well done!
title: Excellent

author: 19 - MACKIE - 87
comment: Tried loads of watch faces but none compare to this one. It's just way cooler than every other one. My friends say the same. Shame as I'd like a change now and then but the face is a part of me now haha

author: Joe Rochinski
comment: I hate the new font. Next time don't introduce such a drastic change without giving users a way to choose which font they want. New version still hasn't fixed this.
title: Restore original font

author: Matthew McNair
comment: I really like this one. My only wish is that the app icon didn't occupy the app drawer on my phone since all of the options for watches these days can be handle directly through the Android Wear app. Great watch face Dev! 👍👍
title: Nice!

author: Ashley Strachan
comment: My daily watch face. Beautiful simplistic watch face. Font is spot on too. My only complaint (!) I would love to be able to slow down the falling text, might just be me it just looks a little too quick. If there was an option for fall speed adjustment that'd be great. But still one of the best out there. Asus zenwatch.

author: Hans Jaquez
comment: The new design is horrible please bring back the old one! I'd be willing to pay to have option to change the clock font.
title: BRING THE OLD ONE BACK

author: Andrew Christensen
comment: I really like the app and do not mind the font, however,  it would be awesome if a settings area was added where the font could be changed,  time can be set to military,  and date could be turned on. My biggest issue is that there is no date.
title: Almost perfect

author: Bryant Kazmerzak
comment: Please give us the option to change the font, the current one looks like dogshit and it's the only reason why I do not use this face.  Also, maybe give us the option to change the scrolling speed of the vertical "code" wall.
title: Give the option to change the font please

author: C. Ware
comment: Sorry was speechless for a second. Jus downloaded abot 5 different watch apps. Downloaded this one, then deleted the rest. Like guy said whether you like The Matrix or not this is pure awesomeness.
title: Is this really on my wrist?...Awesome!!!!!

author: GA L
comment: Unfortunately the vendor does not refund as others do. Very poor business ethic. I would strongly recommend NOT purchase this watchface.
title: Doesn't suite sony 3 sw

author: Nick Higham
comment: Used to have a fossil watch with this face,  lived everything about it,  love everything about this face. To all the whiners moaning about fonts and colors, his source code is listed, you can fix it, I've got faith in your obviously superior skills.
title: Great

author: Nathan Hindy
comment: Well, it bricked my watch. That's super awesome fun time. Now I get to learn how to reformat a moto 360 without any operating system. Never again will I try this.
title: Opposite of Amazing

author: Patrick Morgan
comment: Please disregard reviews from the crying babies that complain about what is a good improvement in design, and lends better to the face's theme. Also text seems to scroll more smoothly on my 360 since the update. Good job, keep it up guys.
title: The font update is a good thing

author: Rossen Varbanov
comment: It is great but please make an option to switch to the old font style and will give 5 stars. I can't read this one although it fits better with the design.
title: Great watchface but...

author: David Bieber
comment: Please allow customization of the font to use the old one at least. The animated background is phenomenal but the font makes this not usable.
title: Updated font is hard to read

author: die4ever2005
comment: This is really great. I would like if I could adjust the idle timer though, it goes back to ambient too quickly. And maybe some interactive elements would be cool, like being able to launch an app by tapping a spot. And maybe a little bit of animated scrolling symbols in ambient mode? Even if it's just 1fps?

author: Jon brigham
comment: I can not read the time on my moto 360 without really looking at my watch. This is super annoying!!!I am not sure why we can't adjust how the numbers look or add the date.
title: Cool idea but that font sucks!!!

author: Vaibhav Pathak
comment: I liked the earlier fonts more . this look more like a digital background with a gothic text that does not go well together. Also i liked the top aligned text on moto 360 . in case of notifications too time was not hidden . please add a small date widget at bottom.
title: Keep time position where it is on moto360

author: Daniel Gamble
comment: The scrolling code speed is just a little faster than how it was in the film, but who's splitting hairs over that? Only wish the time font was a little more clear to read. Other than that this is one of the best watch faces I've seen for the Android.
title: Cool design

author: Partisan Germ
comment: Doesn't quite have the effect I'm looking for. But then I'm a Matrix fanboy so my standards are a bit high.

author: David Murray
comment: Great watchface for my Moto360. Been using it for months. People complaining about the style change need to remember this watchface is $FREE.99, so stfu.
title: Looks great on Moto 360

comment: This watch-face looks incredible and works flawlessly, with minimal battery usage... Aside from my own watch-faces (that I have created), this is quite literally one of my favorite watch-faces! Whether you're a fan of "The Matrix" franchise or you just want something that looks cool (love the font, too!), this is a great place to start.
title: One of my favorite watch-faces!

author: Sunny Lalli
comment: Does a great job of being matrix like.   However the source code that falls is moving way to fast.   If its slowed down to how it is in the movie,  it would be worthy of a higher rating.
title: Not bad

author: Jeremy Wood
comment: I agree.  Looks nice when all glowing but on white time out it looks horrid to me.  The old font was much easier to read at a glance.
title: Please add option for old font.

author: Paul McAlindon
comment: I have a few watch faces now but this is by far my favourite even if you don't like the matix films this still looks cool
title: Amazing watch face

author: Ra Cofi
comment: For me is nice original is not perfect but  good  job .the work of others must be respected can you give more options  I give you thank you

author: Luis Pertuz
comment: I tend to stick to the built-in watch faces for my moto 360 mainly because they're the only ones who let me have a decent battery life on the watch.  I downloaded this face today and love the look of it but my battery lasted less than 5 hours of normal use.
title: Nice watch face... Por battery life

author: Mete Tüfekci
comment: Please make an option for old the style. The new one is waaaaay too fancy
title: Wtf. Dont want a style update

author: Chris Overstreet
comment: Now not so much.  Font is hard to read.  Deleted.
title: Was good

author: Kyle X
comment: Why military time only? It wouldn't be difficult at all to implement both time modes, so why military time over standard am/pm ? I'd like this a lot more if I were a soldier or a doctor/nurse but oh well..
title: Cool, but no options

author: Jacob Duane Johnson
comment: Add a functioning settings menu so users can change the effect speed, it's waaaay too fast to resemble classic matrix code...look it up.
title: Very basic and not what I'm looking for

author: Erik Ross
comment: Doesn't work, it never loads on device or phone. Don't waste your time with this broken app.

author: Tim Ott
comment: Maybe options to slow down the background text and options to add day/date to the face
title: Just needs a few options

author: Markus5 Productions
comment: Looks OK just like the movie but where is the customization? I would rate higher but then it would be f as lse advertisement!
title: Nice watch face but no customization

author: lynn teeter
comment: There is more small things that could had been done
title: I like it but

author: Josh Garcia
comment: Designed with no gimmicks. I love to find apps that do not add permissions to there app just to have them. Thank you for your work.
title: No special permissions needed

author: KiLLeMeZy
comment: By far one of the best faces that ive downloaded for my moto 360 and it was free couldn't ask for more nothin more to say. Thanks bruh
title: Great face

author: Sorin
comment: Nice to have. No permissions, good developer
title: Like it

author: jay ray
comment: Complete waist of time and space. Downloaded but doesn't work at all.

author: Jus Me
comment: it had the date and temperature showing somewhere in the encoded matrix. You can do  it.
title: Love It! Wish...
